SELECT uo.*,u.`userName`,u.`realName` FROM userorder uo ,USER u WHERE uo.`userId`=u.`id`
and u.userName like CONCAT('%','${userName}','%')
and u.realName like CONCAT('%','${realName}','%')
and uo.createTime >= #{startTime}
and uo.createTime < date_add(#{endTime} , INTERVAL 1 day)
ORDER BY uo.`createTime` DESC
